title: Riot is absolutely useless. Game is unplayable
body:
http://imgur.com/c7zkN3G

Rito and spaghetti code

AMD R9 295X & Intel i7 4790K, 16 GB DDR3. Not playing on a toaster. 

Fresh install of macOS 10.12.4, worked with old client. New client is garbage.

replies.body:
The client and in-game application are independent.  This screen issue was happening last week, and should be resolved now.  If this is still happening to you, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will look into your case to see what's going o

In the meantime, you should be able to tap Alt+Enter in-game to restore your screen.  See you there!
